pages.text: Gohei is a melee weapon that can also launch ranged AoE attacks with danmaku. $(br2)To switch to a different style of danmaku, scroll the mouse whell while holding ALT.
The higher the player's Power is, the more damage the Gohei deals.$(br2)Also used in the creation of The Altar.
